Author: publixbogo
Text: There's no reliable way to do it. Some people are more... effective purgers, for lack of a better word, so they might only be retaining 10% of their calories, whereas others might only be able to get rid of 50% or less. Also, different foods are broken down at different rates and the amount of time you wait between eating and purging will also influence how many calories are taken in. There's too many variables, I think.
